name: Battle Arena Toshinden
description: The Toshin Daibukai tournament has arrived. Ten of the toughest fighters in the world are taking part in the most grueling slugfest known to man. To win, each combatant must be completely focused. One slip and their fate is sealed. Who will be crowned champion? That is up to you. So get off your duff and get ready for the fight of your life with Battle Arena Toshinden!
